name: Volt
description: Volt is a sleek and stylish oscilloscope-themed robot. With its shiny black box and retro console buttons, it exudes a nostalgic charm. Its classic arms and legs provide a touch of elegance, perfectly complementing its screen. The addition of shades gives Volt a cool and mysterious vibe. It is a proud member of the WebtrES club, showcasing its love for technology and the digital world.
